name: test_e2e_with_logs[785_CRLF_RESP_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_RESP_005` |
| **Name** | Transfer-Encoding Injection via CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | response_splitting |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nTransfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aTransfer-Encoding%3Achunked%0d%0a`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:27.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
